mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weather (baseDate, baseTime, fcstDate, fcstTime, nx, ny, pop, pty, r06, reh, s06, sky, t3h, tmn, tmx, uuu, vvv, wav, vec, wsd) VALUES (#{baseDate}, #{baseTime}, #{fcstDate}, #{fcstTime}, #{nx}, #{ny}, #{pop}, #{pty}, #{r06}, #{reh}, #{s06}, #{sky}, #{t3h}, #{tmn}, #{tmx}, #{uuu}, #{vvv}, #{wav}, #{vec}, #{wsd})
